text: Poás Volcano National Park, in Spanish , is a National Park in Costa Rica. The volcano is in the province of Alajuela . The main crater is deep and is active. There are frequent small geyser and lava eruptions. The last major eruptions were during 1952-54. The park is frequently closed because of sulphur gas. Over the last decade there have been indications that the volcano is slowly building up for a new eruption. ==References== Category:National parks in Costa Rica Category:Alajuela Province
title: Poás Volcano National Park
